metadata.name: ShardPengu
metadata.description: This ‘Shard’ is an NFT representation of your fractional ownership of insrt's Pudgy Party vault, featuring a Golden Kimono Pengu (#1886), Tuft Pengu (#8396), Bowl (#3165), and some Pengu friends (#7423, #1648, #1249). To round out the party, the vault also owns 10 rods and 9 lil pudgies. This vault is part of Season 0 of insrt finance's reward campaign.
